name: SuggestionsBuilderHelper
description: A utility helper class that wraps Minecraft's Brigadier SuggestionsBuilder to provide convenient methods for creating tab completion suggestions in custom JSMacros commands.
overview: The SuggestionsBuilderHelper provides a fluent interface for adding various types of suggestions to command arguments. It supports simple string suggestions, numeric suggestions, suggestions with tooltips, position-based suggestions, identifier suggestions, and more. The class is designed to be used within custom command suggestion callbacks created with CommandBuilder.suggest().

methods.name: getInput
methods.description: Returns the complete current input string being processed for suggestions.

methods.name: getStart
methods.description: Returns the starting index in the input string where suggestions should apply.

methods.name: getRemaining
methods.description: Returns the remaining portion of the input string after the start index that should be matched against suggestions.

methods.name: getRemainingLowerCase
methods.description: Returns the remaining portion of the input string converted to lowercase for case-insensitive matching.

methods.name: suggest
methods.description: Adds a simple string suggestion to the suggestion list.

methods.name: suggest
methods.description: Adds an integer value as a string suggestion.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The integer value to suggest as a string

methods.name: suggestWithTooltip
methods.description: Adds a suggestion with an associated tooltip that appears when the player hovers over the suggestion.

parameters.name: tooltip
parameters.description: The tooltip text to display when hovering over the suggestion

methods.name: suggestWithTooltip
methods.description: Adds an integer suggestion with an associated tooltip.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The integer value to suggest as a string

parameters.name: tooltip
parameters.description: The tooltip text to display when hovering over the suggestion

methods.name: suggestMatching
methods.description: Adds multiple suggestions that will be matched against the remaining input using fuzzy matching.

parameters.name: suggestions
parameters.description: Array of suggestion strings to match against

methods.name: suggestMatching
methods.description: Overload that accepts a Collection instead of an array.

parameters.name: suggestions
parameters.description: Collection of suggestion strings to match against

methods.name: suggestIdentifier
methods.description: Adds suggestions for resource identifiers (namespace:path format). Validates that the identifiers follow Minecraft's identifier format.

parameters.name: identifiers
parameters.description: Array of identifier strings to suggest

methods.name: suggestIdentifier
methods.description: Overload that accepts a Collection instead of an array.

parameters.name: identifiers
parameters.description: Collection of identifier strings to suggest

methods.name: suggestPositions
methods.description: Adds position suggestions using string coordinates. Supports relative coordinates with ~ and ^.

parameters.name: positions
parameters.description: Array of position strings in "x y z" format

methods.name: suggestPositions
methods.description: Overload that accepts a Collection instead of an array.

parameters.name: positions
parameters.description: Collection of position strings in "x y z" format

methods.name: suggestBlockPositions
methods.description: Adds position suggestions using BlockPosHelper objects.

parameters.name: positions
parameters.description: Array of BlockPosHelper objects to suggest

methods.name: suggestBlockPositions
methods.description: Overload that accepts a Collection instead of an array.

parameters.name: positions
parameters.description: Collection of BlockPosHelper objects to suggest

methods.name: buildFuture
methods.description: Builds and returns the suggestions future that should be returned from suggestion callbacks. This method is typically the last call in a suggestion callback.

methods.name: getRaw
methods.description: Returns the underlying Minecraft SuggestionsBuilder object (inherited from BaseHelper).
